Setting Up a Home Coffee Bar: My Journey into Specialty Coffee

March 15, 2024 Coffee Hobbies Guide

As someone deeply interested in coffee, I often get asked about setting up a home coffee bar. While I'm still learning and experimenting myself, I wanted to share my current setup and some insights I've gained along the way.
